13.1.hd_quote: The ability to relate and commune with everyone with equanimity.
13.1.behavioral_axis: Receives stories without bias; establishes trust that invites disclosure.
13.1.shadow_axis: Takes on others’ baggage; loses boundaries trying to be universally open.

13.2.hd_quote: Tolerance as the least offensive manifestation of bigotry.
13.2.behavioral_axis: Other people download into you; you develop filters for what’s worth hearing.
13.2.shadow_axis: Cynical gatekeeping; writing people off before listening fully.

13.3.hd_quote: A lack of trust that can only be transformed through concrete evidence.
13.3.behavioral_axis: Learns whom to trust by painful experience; demands proof.
13.3.shadow_axis: Jaded narrative; satire or biting commentary that alienates allies.

13.4.hd_quote: Openness which leads to exhaustion and the need for silence.
13.4.behavioral_axis: Broadcast-networker who forgets to pause and reflect.
13.4.shadow_axis: Compassion fatigue; collapsing boundaries until total shutdown.

13.5.hd_quote: The ability to overcome all obstacles for the betterment of humanity.
13.5.behavioral_axis: People project ‘save us’ onto your listening; you place resources and roles wisely.
13.5.shadow_axis: Crushed by projections; blamed when stories don’t resolve cleanly.

13.6.hd_quote: The ability to accept any limited interaction as a necessary step towards greater union.
13.6.behavioral_axis: Sees the value in imperfect exchanges; distills what uplifts the whole.
13.6.shadow_axis: Naivete projected onto you; withdraws from listening in maturity.
